title: Skins that transform gender?

embed.description: Hey friends and welcome back to Fandom Friday!](https://i.imgur.com/IKvKJnM.png) (image courtesy of /u/QDesJardin) This week's theme is **Rule...

body: This Post has had me thinking if riot has ever considered making skins that change a characters gender, this may require new voice overs and small modelling adjustments but i think it would be very popular. I think 975 or 1350 would be an appropriate price.

replies.body:
I think so long as is doesn't make fun of trans people or issues it could be pretty cool/fun (so probably not "[champion] in drag" or something).

But also, they'd have to be aware that changing a character's gender might change their silhouette, which might make them harder to recognise.  So they'd have to do it in such a way as to retain  the general shape of the character, which honestly sounds really hard.

I actually think that sounds awesome.. the female Braum that person drew kicks ass! A lot of the others do too.
They could even have some fun with the names like "Mister Fortune" Instead of Miss, or maybe Nurse/Mrs Mundo
Nasus could actually be Susan! lol
league is the last thing that needs to have anything to do with gender identity issues/choices/sexuality/whatever the fuck they wanna call it
